mountaincar
Class MountainCar

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractEnvironmentSingle
      mountaincar.MountainCar
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnvironment, IEnvironmentSingle, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MountainCarTiling, MountainCarTilingH
public class MountainCar
extends AbstractEnvironmentSingle

A car has to climb up a mountain, and to succeed, it needs to drive a little bit backward, in order to have enough speed to win the slope. The problem is described in Sutton & Barto, page 214

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
Serialized Form

whoWins

public int whoWins(IState s)
Description copied from interface: IEnvironment
Who won ?
  • Two-players game :
    • Player One : -1
    • Tie : 0
    • Player Two : 1
  • Single-player game :
    • Win : -1
    • Null: 0
    • Loose: 1

Specified by:
